definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
(bird species of China) black scoter (Melanitta nigra)

sentences.english: Georgia is situated to the east of the Black Sea in the southern Caucasus.
sentences.chinese: 克魯吉亞位於黑海東部，高加索山南部。

sentences.english: Have you swum in the Black Sea?
sentences.chinese: 你們在黑海中游泳了嗎？

sentences.english: Clouds and showers soon returned to Sochi, and the Black Sea returned to its seasonally typical tempestuous ways.
sentences.chinese: 雲和雨回到索契，黑海恢復季節性的洶湧。

sentences.english: A sailor's cap floats in the Ukranian Black Sea Port.
sentences.chinese: 一名士兵的帽子漂浮在烏克蘭黑海港口裏。

sentences.english: Ukraine, Crimea, Black sea, view from Ai-Petri mountain.
sentences.chinese: 烏克蘭，克里米亞，黑海，從愛的Petri山景。

sentences.english: The Black Sea also connects to the Sea of Azov by the Strait of Kerch.
sentences.chinese: 黑海還通過刻赤海峽與壓速海相連。

sentences.english: In Bulgaria, I would go for the medieval monasteries and Black Sea resorts.
sentences.chinese: 在保加利亞，我推薦到中世紀修道院和黑海度假地。

sentences.english: President Bush will confer with President Putin in the Black Sea resort town of Sochi.
sentences.chinese: 布什總統將在黑海渡假勝地的索契市與普京總統會談。

sentences.english: Round the north-east of the Black and Caspian Seas were coming the Medes and Persians.
sentences.chinese: 從黑海和裏海的東北部來了米堤亞人和波斯人。

sentences.english: The blast took place at the Karadon mine near the Black Sea port of Zonguldak.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸發生在臨近黑海的松古達克港的卡拉東礦。

sentences.english: Zigana Pass, Eastern Black Sea Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 黑海山脈東部的齊格納通道。

definition: Sea of Azov in southern Russia

pinyin: Zhi2 bu4 luo2 tuo2 Hai3 xia2
Da2 da2 ni2 er3 Hai3 xia2

definition: the Bering Strait (between Siberia and Alaska)
